TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InheritanceBehavior extends System.Enum

summary.span: 表示屬性值繼承 (資源查詢) 和 RelativeSource FindAncestor 查詢目前的查詢模式。

span.span: Indicates the current mode of lookup for both property value inheritance, a resource lookup, and a RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用繫結，就會發生 RelativeSource FindAncestor 查閱具有其屬性設定為值。A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup occurs when a binding uses a that has its property set to the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior Default = int32(0)

summary.span: 屬性值繼承查閱會查詢現有項目，並從項目樹狀目錄向上查閱到頁面根項目。

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element and continue walking up the element tree to the page root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源查閱會透過目前的項目查詢，並進一步。A resource lookup will query through the current element and further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipAllNext = int32(6)

summary.span: 屬性值繼承查閱是會查詢現有項目，但不會查詢其他項目。

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的項目，但不是任何進一步，將查詢的資源查閱。A resource lookup will query the current element but not any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipAllNow = int32(5)

summary.span: 屬性值繼承查閱是不會查詢現有項目或其他項目。

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源查閱不會查詢目前的項目，或任何其他。A resource lookup will not query the current element or any further. RelativeSource FindAncestor 查閱不會查詢目前的項目，或任何其他。A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToAppNext = int32(2)

summary.span: 屬性值繼承查閱是會查詢現有項目，但不會查詢其他項目。

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源查閱會查詢目前的項目，並跳至的應用程式和佈景主題的字典，而不是向上瀏覽到頁面的根項目樹狀結構。A resource lookup will query the current element and will then skip over to the application and theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToAppNow = int32(1)

summary.span: 屬性值繼承查閱是不會查詢現有項目或其他項目。

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源查閱不會查詢目前的項目，但會跳到應用程式，然後主題字典，而非向上瀏覽到頁面的根項目樹狀結構。A resource lookup will not query the current element but will skip over to the application and then the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root. RelativeSource FindAncestor 查閱不會查詢目前的項目，或任何其他。A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToThemeNext = int32(4)

summary.span: 屬性值繼承查閱是會查詢現有項目，但不會查詢其他項目。

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源查閱會查詢目前的項目，並跳至主題字典，而非向上瀏覽到頁面的根，項目樹狀結構或檢查應用程式的字典。A resource lookup will query the current element and will then skip over to the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root, or checking application dictionaries.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToThemeNow = int32(3)

summary.span: 屬性值繼承查閱是不會查詢現有項目或其他項目。

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源查閱不會查詢目前的項目，但會跳至主題字典，而不是向上瀏覽到頁面的根，項目樹狀結構或檢查應用程式的字典。A resource lookup will not query the current element but will skip over to the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root, or checking application dictionaries. RelativeSource FindAncestor 查閱不會查詢目前的項目，或任何其他。A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.
